analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: smig rgyu la chu med par chu'i 'du shes su gyur pa dang / chu klung med par chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / grong khyer med pa la grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / skyed mos tshal med par skye mos tshal gyi 'du shes su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: smig rgyu la chu med par chu'i 'du shes su gyur pa dang / chu klung med par chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / grong khyer med pa la grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / skyed mos tshal med par skye mos tshal gyi 'du shes su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am /
translated: In the case of a mirage, where there is no water but there is the perception of water, where there is no river but there is the perception of a river, where there is no city but there is the perception of a city, and where there is no park but there is the perception of a park, what is the path of perception that is formed by which one goes to the hells,

analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'am /

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba'am / che ba'i lhar skye ba'am /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis te /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags /
translated: then how is it that the Blessed One has declared purification?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: “Subhūti, that which is the sameness of all phenomena

original: gnas rnam par byang bar gsungs so //
analyzed: gnas rnam par byang bar gsungs so //
translated: The Buddha replied, “Subhūti, it is the purification of the realm of phenomena.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti then asked, “Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: what is the sameness of all phenomena?”

original: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang @429a *//🔽dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang @429a *// dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Subhūti, it is thusness, unmistaken thusness, unaltered thusness, the nature of phenomena, the realm of phenomena, the establishment of phenomena, the seat of phenomena, the real nature, the limit of reality, the expanse of reality, the very essence of phenomena, and the ultimate.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: Whether the thus-gone ones appear or not,🔽this realm of phenomena remains just as it is.

original: de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang / dbyings 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang / dbyings 'di lta ste /
translated: This is the establishment of phenomena, the realm, and the expanse of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: This is called the realm of phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / rnam par byang ba ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par byang ba ste /
translated: Subhūti, this is purification.

original: de ni / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi /
analyzed: de ni / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi /
translated: This is expressed through worldly conventions,

original: de ni / brjod du med cing smos su med pa ste /
analyzed: de ni / brjod du med cing smos su med pa ste /
translated: but it is inexpressible and cannot be mentioned.

original: sgra dang / tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so //
analyzed: sgra dang / tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so //
translated: It is a Dharma that transcends all paths of words and phrases.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “Blessed One,

original: gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu /🔽sgra brnyan lta bu /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu / sgra brnyan lta bu /
translated: if all phenomena are like a dream,🔽like an echo,

original: mig yor lta bu /🔽smig rgyu lta bu /
analyzed: mig yor lta bu / smig rgyu lta bu /
translated: like an optical illusion,🔽like a mirage,

original: sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na /
translated: like an illusion, and like a magical creation,🔽how can bodhisattva great beings, when all phenomena are like a dream,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang / chos thams cad mig yor lta bu dang / chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang / chos thams cad mig yor lta bu dang / chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
translated: like an echo, like an optical illusion, like a mirage, like an illusion,

original: chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu ste /
translated: and like a magical creation,

original: dngos po ma mchis pa /
analyzed: dngos po ma mchis pa /
translated: which are unreal and insubstantial,

original: rdzas ma mchis pa la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzas ma mchis pa la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: perfect the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: perfect the perfection of discipline,🔽and perfect the perfection of patience?

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽@429b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // @429b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the perfection of concentration.🔽“You should complete the perfection of wisdom.

original: thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the perfection of skillful means.

original: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the perfection of aspiration.

original: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the perfection of strength.

original: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the perfection of knowledge.🔽“You should complete inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should complete the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽“You should perfect the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽“You should perfect the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.🔽“You should perfect the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽“You should perfect the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the emptiness of nonentities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature should be brought to completion;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs @430a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs @430a *//
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities should be brought to completion;

original: par bya'o // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: par bya'o // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the four applications of mindfulness should be brought to completion;

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the four right efforts should be brought to completion;

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the four legs of supernatural power should be brought to completion;🔽the five faculties should be brought to completion;

original: stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the five powers should be brought to completion;

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the seven factors of awakening should be brought to completion;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //🔽bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the noble eightfold path should be brought to completion;🔽the four noble truths should be brought to completion;🔽the four concentrations should be brought to completion;

original: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: the four immeasurables should be brought to completion;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “You should perfect the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect all the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect the four assurances.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect the four kinds of exact knowledge.

original: byams pa chen @430b po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen @430b po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: You should perfect great loving kindness.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will perfect great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will perfect the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will perfect the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will perfect the eighty minor marks.

original: 'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will perfect great radiance.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par bya ste /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par bya ste /
translated: I will know with my mind the mental processes of the sentient beings in the world systems in the ten directions, and

original: dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will perfect the Brahma-voice, the teaching of the Dharma in accordance with the aspirations of sentient beings with a single sound.”

original: zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags /
analyzed: zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags /
translated: In this way, they give rise to the mind set on unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam /
translated: Are those dharmas that you have spoken about not like a dream, like an echo, like an apparition, like an illusion, like a mirage, like a magical creation?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: gal te chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na /
analyzed: gal te chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na /
translated: if those dharmas are like a dream, like an echo, like an apparition, like a mirage, like an illusion, like a magical creation,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi /
translated: how should a bodhisattva great being practice the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rmi lam ni /
analyzed: rmi lam ni /
translated: a dream

original: yang dag pa ma lags /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma lags /
translated: is not real.

original: sgra brnyan ni /
analyzed: sgra brnyan ni /
translated: An echo

original: yang dag pa ma lags /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma lags /
translated: is not real.

original: mig yor ni /
analyzed: mig yor ni /
translated: An apparition

original: yang dag pa ma lags /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma lags /
translated: is not real.

original: smig rgyu @431a *//
analyzed: smig rgyu @431a *//
translated: A mirage

original: ni; yang dag pa ma lags /
analyzed: ni; yang dag pa ma lags /
translated: is not real.

original: sgyu ma ni /
analyzed: sgyu ma ni /
translated: An illusion

original: yang dag pa ma lags /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma lags /
translated: is not real.

original: sprul pa ni /
analyzed: sprul pa ni /
translated: A magical creation

original: yang dag pa ma lags te /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma lags te /
translated: is not real.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: yang dag pa ma lags pas /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma lags pas /
translated: because of that which is not real,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /
translated: I have practiced the perfection of generosity, I have practiced the perfection of discipline, I have practiced the perfection of patience, I have practiced the perfection of diligence,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
translated: I have practiced the perfection of concentration, I have practiced the perfection of wisdom, I have practiced inner emptiness, I have practiced outer emptiness, I have practiced inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
translated: I have practiced the emptiness of emptiness, I have practiced great emptiness, I have practiced ultimate emptiness, I have practiced conditioned emptiness, I have practiced unconditioned emptiness,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
translated: They are the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent nature,🔽the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / yang @431b dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / yang @431b dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities. They are the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions, the four bases of supernatural powers,

original: dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang /
translated: the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness gate of liberation,

translated: They are unable to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through practicing the perfection of giving, through practicing the perfection of morality, through practicing the perfection of patience, through practicing the perfection of perseverance, through practicing the perfection of concentration, through practicing the perfection of wisdom, through practicing the applications of mindfulness, through practicing the right efforts, through practicing the legs of miraculous power, through practicing the five faculties, through practicing the five powers, through practicing the seven aspects of awakening, through practicing the eightfold noble path, through practicing emptiness, through practicing signlessness, through practicing wishlessness, through practicing the five higher cognitions, through practicing all meditative stabilizations, through practicing all dhāraṇī gateways, through practicing the ten tathāgata powers,🔽through practicing the four fearlessnesses, through practicing the four detailed and thorough knowledges, through practicing great love, through practicing great compassion, and through practicing the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽🔽The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom.🔽They practice inner emptiness,🔽outer emptiness,🔽inner and outer emptiness,🔽the emptiness of emptiness,

original: nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
translated: great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /
translated: They are the practice of the emptiness of ultimate reality, the practice of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the practice of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the practice of the emptiness of beyond extremes, the practice of the emptiness of no beginning or end,🔽the practice of the emptiness of nonrejection, the practice of the emptiness of inherent nature, the practice of the emptiness of all phenomena, the practice of the emptiness of specific characteristics, the practice of the emptiness of nonapprehension,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /
translated: the practice of the emptiness of nonthings, the practice of the emptiness of essence, the practice of the emptiness of the essence of nonthings, the practice of the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags @432b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang /

translated: They practice the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang /
translated: They practice the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang /
translated: They practice the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are the gateways to liberation, and the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /

translated: nor by practicing all the meditative stabilizations, nor by practicing all the dhāraṇī gateways, nor by practicing the ten tathāgata powers, nor by practicing the four fearlessnesses, nor by practicing the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: byams pa chen po la spyad pa dang / snying rje chen pa la spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas /
analyzed: byams pa chen po la spyad pa dang / snying rje chen pa la spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas /

translated: The transcendent perfection of generosity does not attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The transcendent perfection of tolerance does not attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //🔽phyi stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par @438a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o // nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o // phyi stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par @438a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽Inner emptiness does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: Outer emptiness does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of the external is not fully awakened into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The emptiness of both is not fully awakened into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not fully awakened into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: chen po stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is not fully awakened into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not fully awakened into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not fully awakened into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The emptiness of what transcends limits does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonrepudiation does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: @438b chos thams cad stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: @438b chos thams cad stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining attributes does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonobservation does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The right efforts do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽The legs of miraculous power do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dbang po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The faculties do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The powers do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The truths of the noble ones do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bsam gtan rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The immeasurables do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The formless absorptions do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The liberations do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The serial absorptions do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The emptiness, signless, and wishless gateways to liberation do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @439b chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @439b chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The superknowledges do not awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations do not awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways do not awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas do not awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: The fearlessnesses do not awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: the analytical knowledges will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byams pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o; ;snying rje chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o; ;snying rje chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: great love will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening; great compassion will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa mngon par 'dus byas pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa mngon par 'dus byas pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, if you ask why,🔽it is because all those dharmas are compounded and have been made manifest.

original: 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni /
translated: A dharma that is compounded and has been made manifest

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so //
translated: they are unable to attain the knowledge of all modes.

original: rab 'byor / 'on kyang chos de dag ni /🔽thams cad kyang lam sgrub @440a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'on kyang chos de dag ni / thams cad kyang lam sgrub @440a *//
translated: But, Subhuti, all these dharmas

original: pa dang / lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste /🔽'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: pa dang / lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste / 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni /
translated: are the cause for the making and the building up of the path,

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: but not for the attainment of the fruit.

original: chos de dag gi mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: chos de dag gi mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni /
translated: The nonproduction and nonappearance of these dharmas

original: mtshan nyid med pa'ang de yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'ang de yin te /
translated: is also their mark.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
analyzed: byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /
translated: from the first thought of enlightenment onwards the Bodhisattva, the great being, should perfect the wholesome dharmas, whether the perfection of giving,

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am /

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am / nang stong pa nyid dam /

original: phyi stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dam /

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dam /

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam /

original: chen po stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dam /

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dam /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dam / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams sam /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /
translated: great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /

original: dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: They are the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma @441a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma @441a *//
translated: the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited,

original: byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of inherent natures, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative stabilizations, the gateways to liberation, the serial absorptions, the emptiness gateway to liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
translated: the signlessness gateway to liberation, the wishlessness gateway to liberation, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad @441b po de dag yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'am /
translated: the great love, the great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha cannot be brought to completion without bringing beings to maturity,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar mi nus pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar mi nus pas /
translated: and without bringing beings to maturity, the knowledge of all aspects cannot be attained.”🔽“

original: de'i phyir de lta bas na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes so //🔽sgra brnyan lta bur shes so; ;mig yor lta bur shes so //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes so // sgra brnyan lta bur shes so; ;mig yor lta bur shes so //

original: smig rgyu lta bur shes so //
analyzed: smig rgyu lta bur shes so //

original: sgyu ma lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bur shes so //

original: sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sprul pa lta bur shes so //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so //

analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like an optical illusion, like a mirage, like an emanation, and like a magical creation.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know the perfection of moral discipline is like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so //

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: “When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he knows that the perfection of perseverance is like a dream,

analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig @442a *//

analyzed: rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he knows the formless absorptions to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like an optical illusion, like a reflected image, like a magical creation, and like an illusion.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rmi lam lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he knows the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, and the wishless meditative stabilization to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like an optical illusion, like a reflected image, like a magical creation, and like an illusion.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know the superknowledges to be like a dream,🔽like an echo, like an apparition, like a mirage, like an illusion, and like a magical creation.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know the meditative stabilizations to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / @445a *//🔽sprul pa lta bur shes so //

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know the dhāraṇī gateways to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so //

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know the fearlessnesses to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like a mirage, like an illusion, and like a magical creation.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know the detailed and thorough knowledges to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like a mirage, like an illusion, and like a magical creation.
