analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know great love to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like an image in a mirror, like a mirage, like an illusion, and like a magical creation.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe snying rje chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know great compassion to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur @445b shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur @445b shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like an image in a mirror, like a mirage, like an illusion, and like a magical creation.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rmi lam lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha to be like a dream,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: like an echo, like an apparition, like an image in a mirror, like a mirage, like an illusion, and like a magical creation.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thams cad shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thams cad shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know that the knowledge of all aspects is like a dream.

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: They know that it is like an echo, like an apparition, like an optical illusion, like a mirage, like a magical creation, and like an emanation.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know that the knowledge of path aspects is like a dream.

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: They know that it is like an echo, like an apparition, like an optical illusion, like a mirage, like a magical creation, and like an emanation.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so; ;sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /🔽sprul pa lta bur shes so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so; ;sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /🔽sprul pa lta bur shes so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they know that the knowledge of all aspects is like a dream. They know that it is like an echo, like an apparition, like an optical illusion, like a mirage, like a magical creation, and like an emanation.

original: sems can de dag thams cad kyang rmi'am la spyod do //🔽zhes bya bar shes so; ;sgra brnyan la spyod do //
analyzed: sems can de dag thams cad kyang rmi'am la spyod do // zhes bya bar shes so; ;sgra brnyan la spyod do //
translated: And he knows that all those sentient beings are practicing in a dream.

original: zhes bya bar shes so //🔽mig yor la spyod do //
analyzed: zhes bya bar shes so // mig yor la spyod do //
translated: He knows that they are practicing in an echo.

original: zhes bya bar shes so //🔽smig rgyu la spyod do //
analyzed: zhes bya bar shes so // smig rgyu la spyod do //
translated: He knows that they are practicing in an optical aberration.

original: zhes bya bar shes so //🔽sgyu ma la spyod do //🔽zhes bya bar shes so //🔽sprul pa la spyod do //
analyzed: zhes bya bar shes so // sgyu ma la spyod do // zhes bya bar shes so // sprul pa la spyod do //
translated: He knows that they are practicing in a mirage.🔽He knows that they are practicing in an apparition.

original: zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: He knows that they are practicing in a magical creation.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med @446a *//🔽par 'dzin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med @446a *// par 'dzin te /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they apprehend dreamlike dharmas as non-existent.

original: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: They apprehend them like that and attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they apprehend echo-like dharmas as non-existent.

original: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: and having apprehended it, they will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mig yor lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mig yor lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they apprehend phenomena that are like a mirage as not having any real basis,

original: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: and having apprehended it, they will attain the knowledge of all aspects.🔽When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they apprehend phenomena that are like a magical creation as not having any real basis,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe smig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te; de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe smig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te; de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: and having apprehended it, they will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they apprehend phenomena that are like a phantom as not having any real basis,

original: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: and having apprehended it, they will attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po med par 'dzin te /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they apprehend illusory dharmas as non-existent.

original: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: In that way they apprehend and attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is ungraspable.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
translated: The perfection of concentration is ungraspable.🔽The perfection of perseverance is ungraspable.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
translated: The perfection of patience is ungraspable.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //
translated: The perfection of morality is ungraspable.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do //🔽@446b nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzung du med do // @446b nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do // phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The perfection of giving is ungraspable.🔽Inner emptiness is ungraspable.🔽Outer emptiness is ungraspable.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is ungraspable.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do // chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is ungraspable.🔽The emptiness of the great is ungraspable.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is ungraspable.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is ungraspable.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is ungraspable.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of beyond extremes is ungraspable.🔽The emptiness of no beginning or end is ungraspable.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection is ungraspable.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is ungraspable.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is ungraspable.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is ungraspable.🔽The emptiness of nonapprehension is ungraspable.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is ungraspable.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also ungraspable.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is also ungraspable.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are also ungraspable.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The right efforts are also ungraspable.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //🔽dbang po rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzung du med do // dbang po rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are also ungraspable.🔽The faculties are also ungraspable.

original: stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The powers are also ungraspable.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are also ungraspable.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzung du med do //
translated: The noble eightfold path is also ungraspable.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //🔽bsam gtan rnams kyang @447a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung du med do // bsam gtan rnams kyang @447a *//
translated: The noble truths are also ungraspable.

original: gzung du med do //
analyzed: gzung du med do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are also ungraspable.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The immeasurables are also ungraspable.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: The formless absorptions are also ungraspable.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the liberations are ungraspable;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the concentrations are ungraspable;🔽the formless absorptions are ungraspable;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzung du med do //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are ungraspable;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the clairvoyances are ungraspable;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the meditative stabilities are ungraspable;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are ungraspable;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are ungraspable;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the fearlessnesses are ungraspable;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //🔽byams pa chen po'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzung du med do // byams pa chen po'ang gzung du med do //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are ungraspable;🔽great love is ungraspable;

original: snying rje chen po'ang gzung du med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang gzung du med do //
translated: great compassion is ungraspable;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du med do //
translated: the distinct attributes of the buddhas are ungraspable;🔽and the knowledge of all aspects is ungraspable.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: “Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gzung du med par shes par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gzung du med par shes par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer to //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings, having understood that all phenomena are ungraspable, strive for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
translated: It is because all phenomena

original: gzung du med cing dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: gzung du med cing dngos po med pa ste /
translated: are ungraspable and insubstantial.

original: rmi lam lta bu /🔽sgra brnyan lta bu /
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu / sgra brnyan lta bu /
translated: They are like a dream,🔽like an echo,

original: mig yor lta bu /🔽smig rgyu lta bu /🔽sgyu ma lta bu /
analyzed: mig yor lta bu / smig rgyu lta bu / sgyu ma lta bu /
translated: like an apparition,🔽like a mirage,🔽like an illusion,

original: sprul pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: sprul pa lta bu ste /
translated: like a magical creation.

original: sems can rnams kyi chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ba ma @447b gtogs par gzung du med pa'i chos kyis gzung du med pa'i chos gang yang thob par mi nus pas /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ba ma @447b gtogs par gzung du med pa'i chos kyis gzung du med pa'i chos gang yang thob par mi nus pas /
translated: Except for sentient beings not knowing and not seeing those phenomena, it is not possible for an ungraspable phenomenon to attain an ungraspable phenomenon.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /
translated: Therefore, bodhisattva great beings set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du gtong ngo //
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don du gtong ngo //
translated: Whatever giving he practices, from the first production of the thought of awakening onward, he practices it for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsrung ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsrung ngo //
translated: Whatever morality he guards, he guards it for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: bzod pa gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom mo //
analyzed: bzod pa gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom mo //
translated: Whatever patience he cultivates, he cultivates it for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du rtsom mo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du rtsom mo //
translated: Whatever effort he undertakes, he undertakes it for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: Whatever meditative absorption he enters, he enters it for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsgom ste /
analyzed: shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsgom ste /
translated: Whatever wisdom he cultivates, he cultivates it for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: bdag gi don du ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi don du ma yin no //
translated: He does not do it for his own sake.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings

original: sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste /
translated: do not set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for the sake of their own welfare, but for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can gang sems can med pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog med pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /🔽'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gso ba med pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su @448a *//

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they will not settle down on the idea of a being in the absence of a being, on the idea of a self in the absence of a self, on the idea of a life force in the absence of a life force,

translated: They are free from the notion of an agent where there is no agent, free from the notion of an instigator where there is no instigator, free from the notion of a creator where there is no creator, free from the notion of an experiencer where there is no experiencer, free from the notion of a feeler where there is no feeler, free from the notion of a knower where there is no knower, and free from the notion of a perceiver where there is no perceiver.🔽They are free from the notion of an agent where there is no agent, free from the notion of an instigator where there is no instigator, free from the notion of a creator where there is no creator, free from the notion of an experiencer where there is no experiencer, free from the notion of a feeler where there is no feeler, free from the notion of a knower where there is no knower, and free from the notion of a perceiver where there is no perceiver.

original: de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su mi rgyu ste /
analyzed: de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su mi rgyu ste /

analyzed: bdag gi 'du shes sam /

analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes sam /

original: srog gi 'du shes sam /
analyzed: srog gi 'du shes sam /

analyzed: 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam / gso ba'i 'du shes sam / skyes bu'i 'du shes sam /

analyzed: gang zag gi 'du shes sam / shed can gyi 'du shes sam /

analyzed: byed pa po'i 'du shes sam / byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam / slong ba po'i 'du shes sam /

analyzed: mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su mi rgyu ste /

original: de g-yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'dor ba dang / spros pa 'di dag btang nas spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de /
analyzed: de g-yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'dor ba dang / spros pa 'di dag btang nas spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de /
translated: Having given up these movements, conceits, abandonments, and elaborations, they practice with a mind that is free of elaborations.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
translated: Subhūti, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdag nyid kyang chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdag nyid kyang chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med la /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they themselves do not settle down on any phenomenon at all,

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'god de / de ni / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi don dam par ni /
translated: and they also establish all sentient beings in a state of non-settling down.🔽This is in terms of worldly convention,

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: but not in the ultimate sense.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de /

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam /🔽ma lags kyi /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam / ma lags kyi /

original: don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
analyzed: don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
translated: It is not a full awakening in the ultimate sense?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The Tathāgata’s full awakening to this phenomenon is🔽‘This phenomenon is fully awakened to by the Tathāgata.’

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste /🔽de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽zhes bya ba de @449a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste / de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // zhes bya ba de @449a *//
translated: This is the conventional expression of the world.

original: lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te /
translated: In this regard, no phenomenon whatsoever is observed in which it is said,🔽‘This phenomenon is fully awakened to by that phenomenon.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‘This phenomenon is fully awakened to by that phenomenon’

original: dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa ste /
translated: is an observation.

original: gnyis kyis ni /🔽gang yang thob pa'am /
analyzed: gnyis kyis ni / gang yang thob pa'am /
translated: By means of the two,

original: mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: there is nothing whatsoever to be attained or realized.🔽”

original: de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na; gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na; gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram /
translated: “Blessed One, if by means of the two there is nothing to be attained or realized, is there attainment and realization by means of the non-dual?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, there is no attainment and realization by means of the non-dual either.”

original: gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de; gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de; gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: It is not attained or realized through duality, nor is it attained or realized through nonduality.

analyzed: gang la gnyis kyang med la /

original: mi gnyis pa'ang med pa ni /

original: mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: and this is realization.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This

analyzed: spros pa ste /
translated: is a conceptual elaboration.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de /

original: spros pa med pa ni /
analyzed: spros pa med pa ni /

original: chos mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: is the sameness of phenomena.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la /
analyzed: chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la /
translated: in phenomena that are essentially unreal,

original: chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'ang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'ang gang zhig mchis /
translated: what is this so-called ‘sameness of phenomena’?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa; gang la dngos po med pa dang / dngos po med pa la'ang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yongs su brjod pa med pa 'di ni /🔽chos mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa; gang la dngos po med pa dang / dngos po med pa la'ang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yongs su brjod pa med pa 'di ni / chos mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: and the absence of expression.🔽This is the equality of phenomena.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid po @449b de ni; brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid po @449b de ni; brjod du med pa'o //

analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de /
translated: There are no phenomena that can be observed apart from the equality of phenomena.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid ni /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid ni /

original: chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o //

original: chos mnyam pa nyid ni /🔽byis pa'am / 'phags pa'am /

analyzed: chos gang gis kyang shes par mi rung zhing /

original: yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yul ma yin pa'o //

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni /
translated: is the equality of phenomena

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam /
translated: not the domain of the Thus-Gone One?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / chos mnyam pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos mnyam pa nyid ni /
translated: the equality of phenomena

original: 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te /
translated: is not the domain of any noble being.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'am /
translated: the fruit of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am / phyir mi 'ong ba'am /
translated: the fruit of once-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'am /
translated: the fruit of non-returner,🔽the fruit of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: rang byang chub bam /
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'am /
translated: a bodhisattva,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: or a tathāgata.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam /
translated: are not the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas masters of the domain of all phenomena?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni /
translated: if the sameness of phenomena were one thing and the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas were another,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na /
translated: then the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas would be masters of the domain of all phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid @450a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid @450a *//
translated: Subhūti, the sameness of phenomena of ordinary people

original: gang yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gang yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the sameness of phenomena of those who are stream enterers, the sameness of phenomena of those who are once-returners, the sameness of phenomena of those who are non-returners,

original: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the sameness of phenomena of those who are arhats, the sameness of phenomena of those who are pratyekabuddhas, the sameness of phenomena of bodhisattvas, and the sameness of phenomena of tathāgatas,

original: mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: are all one sameness.

original: mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do //
translated: There is no difference whatsoever between sameness and difference.

original: de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Thus, the sameness of ordinary beings and the sameness of all the noble ones

original: mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: and the sameness of all phenomena.

original: mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni /
translated: In this sameness,

original: so so'i skye bo'o //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'o //
translated: this is an ordinary person,

original: 'di ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
translated: this is a stream enterer,

original: 'di ni / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
translated: this is a once returner,

original: 'di ni / phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: this is a nonreturner,

original: 'di ni / dgra bcom pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dgra bcom pa'o //
translated: this is an arhat,

original: 'di ni / rang sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di ni / rang sangs rgyas so //
translated: this is a pratyekabuddha,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: this is a bodhisattva,

original: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: and this is a tathāgata, arhat, perfectly enlightened buddha.

original: zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba med de /
analyzed: zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba med de /
translated: There is no duality in this.

original: rnam par rtog pa de dag ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de dag ni /
translated: These conceptual thoughts

original: mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so //
translated: are not perceived in sameness.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” “Blessed One,

original: de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni /
analyzed: de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni /
translated: if in the sameness of all phenomena

original: so so'i skye @450b bo'o //
analyzed: so so'i skye @450b bo'o //
translated: this is an ordinary person,

original: 'di ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
translated: this is a stream enterer,

original: 'di ni / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
translated: this is a once returner,

original: 'di ni / phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: this is a nonreturner,

original: 'di ni / dgra bcom pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dgra bcom pa'o //
translated: this is an arhat,

original: 'di ni / rang sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di ni / rang sangs rgyas so //
translated: this is a pratyekabuddha,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: This is a bodhisattva.

original: 'di ni; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di ni; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: This is a tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha.’

original: zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na /
analyzed: zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na /
translated: If those conceptual thoughts are not apprehended,

original: des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
analyzed: des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
translated: then there is no difference between ordinary beings and stream enterers, once-returners, non-returners, worthy ones, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
translated: and tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.’

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
translated: In the equality of all phenomena, there is no distinction between ordinary beings,🔽stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners, arhats, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par med do //
translated: and the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,” replied Mañjuśrī,

original: de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams @451a *//
analyzed: de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams @451a *//
translated: “if in the equality of all phenomena there is no distinction between ordinary beings, stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners, arhats, pratyekabuddhas,🔽and bodhisattvas,

original: dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na /
analyzed: dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na /
translated: and the bodhisattvas, and the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas, are not different,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags /
translated: why do the Jewel of the Buddha, the Jewel of the Dharma, and the Jewel of the Saṅgha appear in the world?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Subhūti?

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
translated: Is the Jewel of the Buddha one thing,

original: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
analyzed: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
translated: the Jewel of the Dharma another,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
translated: the Jewel of the Saṅgha another,

original: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
translated: and the sameness of dharmas another?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
translated: according to the meaning of what I have understood from the Blessed One’s teaching,

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
translated: the Jewel of the Buddha is one thing,

original: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
analyzed: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
translated: The jewel of the Dharma is one thing,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
translated: and the jewel of the Saṅgha is another.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi /
translated: The equality of phenomena is not something else.

original: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: Blessed One, the jewel of the Buddha, the jewel of the Dharma, and the jewel of the Saṅgha are the equality of phenomena.

original: chos de dag thams cad ni /🔽ldan pa'ang ma lags /
analyzed: chos de dag thams cad ni / ldan pa'ang ma lags /
translated: All these phenomena

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma lags /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma lags /
translated: are neither conjoined nor disjoined;

original: gzugs ma mchis pa /
analyzed: gzugs ma mchis pa /
translated: they are formless,

original: bstan du ma mchis pa /
analyzed: bstan du ma mchis pa /
translated: cannot be demonstrated,

original: thogs pa ma mchis pa /
analyzed: thogs pa ma mchis pa /
translated: have no resistance,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: and are of a single defining mark—

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o //
translated: that is to say, they are without defining mark.

original: de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni /
analyzed: de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni /
translated: Thus, with regard to phenomena that are without defining mark,

original: so so'i skye @451b bo'o; ;'di ni /
analyzed: so so'i skye @451b bo'o; ;'di ni /
translated: this is an ordinary person,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
translated: this is a stream enterer,

original: 'di ni / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
translated: this is a once-returner,

original: 'di ni / phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: this is a non-returner,

original: 'di ni / dgra bcom pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dgra bcom pa'o //
translated: this is a worthy one,

original: 'di ni / rang sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di ni / rang sangs rgyas so //
translated: This is a pratyekabuddha.

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: This is a bodhisattva.

original: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //🔽zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni /
analyzed: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so // zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni /
translated: This is a tathāgata, an arhat, a perfectly enlightened buddha.’

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo //
translated: “Subhūti, that is the domain of the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor; de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor; de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is so!

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni /
translated: The arrangement of phenomena that are without defining characteristics

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
translated: is the power of the Tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la /
analyzed: de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la /
translated: If the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One were to fully awaken to awakening

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnams rnam par dgod par ma mdzad na /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnams rnam par dgod par ma mdzad na /
translated: and not arrange the teachings because he had fully awakened,

original: sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam /
translated: would the hells exist?

original: byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the animal realm?

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the world of Yama?

original: mi yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mi yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see humans?

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings?

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three?

original: mtshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam /🔽dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam / dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the Yāma gods?🔽Do you see the gods of Tuṣita?

original: 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods who delight in creation?

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam /🔽tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam /🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam / tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods who control others’ creations?🔽Do you see the Brahmakāyika gods?🔽Do you see the gods of Brahmapurohita?

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Brahmapārṣadya?

original: tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam /🔽snang ba'i lha @452a *//🔽yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam / snang ba'i lha @452a *// yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the Mahābrahmā gods?🔽Do you see the gods of Ābhāsvara?

original: chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam /🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam / tshad med snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Parīttābha?🔽Do you see the gods of Apramāṇābha?

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Ābhāsvara?

original: dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Minor Virtue?

original: chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam /🔽tshad med dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam / tshad med dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Minor Goodness?🔽Do you see the gods of Immeasurable Virtue?

original: dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam /🔽che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam / che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Flourishing Virtue?🔽Do you see the gods of Minor Radiance?

original: chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam /🔽tshad med che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam / tshad med che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Minor Splendor?🔽Do you see the gods of Immeasurable Splendor?

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /🔽mi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam / mi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of Vast Splendor?🔽Do you see the gods of the Free from Conflict?

original: mi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam / shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of the Joyous?🔽Do you see the gods of the Manifest?

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam /🔽'og min gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam / 'og min gyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of the Highest?🔽Do you see the gods of the Cloudless?

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of the Sphere of Infinite Space?

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of the Sphere of Infinite Consciousness?

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the gods of the Sphere of Nothingness?

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception evident?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the perfection of generosity evident?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the perfection of moral discipline evident?

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the perfection of patience evident?

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the perfection of perseverance evident?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the perfection of concentration evident? Is the perfection of wisdom evident?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam /🔽nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam / nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the ten bodhisattva stages evident?🔽Is inner emptiness evident?

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is outer emptiness evident?

original: phyi nang @452b stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: phyi nang @452b stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is inner and outer emptiness evident?

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of emptiness evident?

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is great emptiness evident?

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is ultimate emptiness evident?

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of conditioned phenomena evident?

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena evident?🔽Is the emptiness of what transcends limits evident?

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless evident?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of nonrepudiation evident?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of inherent existence evident?

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of all phenomena evident?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of defining characteristics evident?🔽Is the emptiness of nonapprehension evident?

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of nonthings evident?🔽Is the emptiness of essence evident?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is the emptiness of the essence of nonthings evident?

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the applications of mindfulness evident?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the correct exertions evident?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the bases of supernatural powers exist?

original: dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the faculties exist?

original: stobs rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: stobs rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the powers exist?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the branches of awakening exist?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the noble eightfold path exists?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the truths exist?

original: bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the concentrations exist?

original: tshad med pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the immeasurables exist?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the formless absorptions exist?

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yod @453a *//🔽par mngon nam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yod @453a *// par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the deliverances exist?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the serial absorptions exist?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod par mngon nam; mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod par mngon nam; mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation exist? Do you think that the clairvoyances exist?

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the meditative stabilities exist?

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the dhāraṇī gateways exist?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the powers of the tathāgatas exist?

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the fearlessnesses exist?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam /🔽byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam / byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the correct understandings exist?🔽Do you think that great love exists?

original: snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that great compassion exists?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the distinct qualities of the Buddha exist?

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the thirty-two major marks of a great being exist?

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the eighty minor marks exist?

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the jewel of the Buddha exists?

original: chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the jewel of the Dharma exists?

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the jewel of the Saṅgha exists?

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the Śrāvakayāna exists?🔽Do you think that the Pratyeka­buddha­yāna exists?

original: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you think that the Buddha­yāna exists?

original: theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that the Great Vehicle exists?

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are those who follow faith?

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are those who follow the teachings?

original: brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are those on the eighth [bodhisattva] level?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are stream enterers?

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam / phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are once-returners?🔽Is it evident that there are nonreturners?

original: dgra bcom pa @453b yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa @453b yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are arhats?

original: rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are pratyekabuddhas?

original: byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are bodhisattvas?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam /
translated: Is it evident that there are tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: chos de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos de dag thams cad ni /
translated: all those phenomena

original: mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: are not evident.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
translated: “Subhūti, therefore

original: de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: in that way, without wavering from the sameness of all phenomena,

original: chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni /
analyzed: chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni /
translated: The establishment of the Dharma is

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o ////
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o ////
translated: the power of the Tathāgata.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po sum brgya gcig pa //
analyzed: bam po sum brgya gcig pa //
translated: Fascicle Three Hundred and One🔽Śāriputra said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: just as the Tathāgata does not move from the equality of dharmas, do ordinary beings also not move from the equality of dharmas?

original: de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: Similarly, do those who follow by faith not move from the equality of dharmas?

original: de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: Do those who follow the teachings not move from the equality of dharmas?

original: de bzhin du brgyad pa'ang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du brgyad pa'ang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: Do those in the eighth [stage] not move from the equality of dharmas?

original: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: Do those who have entered the stream not move from the equality of dharmas?

original: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: In the same way, do those who are once-returners not move from the sameness of all phenomena?

original: de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo @454a *//🔽ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo @454a *// ba lags sam /
translated: In the same way, do those who are non-returners not move from the sameness of all phenomena?

original: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: In the same way, do those who are arhats not move from the sameness of all phenomena?

original: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: In the same way, do those who are pratyekabuddhas not move from the sameness of all phenomena?

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: In the same way, do bodhisattvas not move from the sameness of all phenomena?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni /🔽chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni / chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena🔽do not move from the sameness of all phenomena.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o //
translated: They do not go beyond the sameness of all phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /

analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni /

analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
translated: and the very limit of reality of the tathāgatas, the worthy ones, the perfectly complete buddhas.🔽That itself🔽is the suchness,🔽unmistaken suchness,🔽and unaltered suchness of the tathāgatas, the worthy ones, the perfectly complete buddhas,🔽the dharma-constituent,🔽the establishment of dharmas,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: the certification of dharmas,🔽and the very limit of reality of the tathāgatas, the worthy ones, the perfectly complete buddhas.🔽That itself

original: de nyid ni /
