analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: great emptiness,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽the emptiness of beginning and end,🔽the emptiness of nonrejection,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽and the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonthings, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of essential nature of nonthings, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions,

original: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
translated: the five kinds of superknowledge, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love,

original: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te /
translated: great compassion, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, the thirty-two major marks of a great person, the eighty minor marks, the compounded element, and the uncompounded element.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: chos de dag ni /
analyzed: chos de dag ni /
translated: these phenomena

original: kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba /
analyzed: kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba /
translated: each one is different from the other,

original: gcig las gcig 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gcig las gcig 'das pa'o //
translated: and each one is beyond the other.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ci'i slad du zhen /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhen /
translated: why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la /🔽tshor ba'i chos @457a *//🔽nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la / tshor ba'i chos @457a *// nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: It is because the true nature of form is one thing,🔽the true nature of feeling is another,

original: 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the true nature of perception is another,

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the true nature of formation is another,

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te /🔽mig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te / mig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the true nature of consciousness is another.🔽The true nature of the eyes is one thing,

original: rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the true nature of the ears is another,🔽the true nature of the nose is another,

original: lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the true nature of the tongue is another,

original: lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the true nature of the body is another,

original: yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the true nature of the mind is another.

original: gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: The true nature of form is one thing,

original: sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the true nature of sound is another,🔽the true nature of smell is another,

original: ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the true nature of taste is another,🔽the true nature of touch is another,

original: chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the true nature of mental phenomena is another.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan; rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan; rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the eye consciousness is one thing, and the dharmatā of the ear consciousness is another;🔽the dharmatā of the nose consciousness is one thing,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the tongue consciousness is another;

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the body consciousness is one thing,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the dharmatā of the mind consciousness is another;🔽the dharmatā of eye contact is one thing,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of ear contact is another,🔽the dharmatā of nose contact is another,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of tongue contact is another,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of body contact is another,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the dharmatā of mind contact is another;

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is one thing,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the real nature of the sensory element of the ears is one thing,🔽the real nature of the sensory element of the nose is another,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang @457b gzhan; lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang @457b gzhan; lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the real nature of the sensory element of the tongue is another,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the real nature of the sensory element of the body is another,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the real nature of the sensory element of the mental faculty is another.

original: sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: “The real nature of the earth element is one thing,

original: chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the real nature of the water element is another,

original: me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the real nature of the fire element is another,🔽the real nature of the wind element is another,

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the real nature of the space element is another,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the real nature of the consciousness element is another.

original: ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: “The real nature of ignorance is one thing,

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the real nature of conditioning is another,🔽and the real nature of consciousness is another.

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan; ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan; ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of consciousness is one thing, and the dharmatā of name and form is another;

original: skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the six sense sources is one thing,

original: reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of contact is another,

original: tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of feeling is another,

original: sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of craving is another,🔽the dharmatā of grasping is another,

original: srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of becoming is another,

original: skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of birth is another,

original: rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the dharmatā of old age and death is another.

original: 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: The dharmatā of desire is one thing,

original: zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan; gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan; gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of anger is another, and the dharmatā of ignorance is another;

original: lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the views is another,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of generosity is another,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of discipline is another,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of patience is another,🔽and the dharmatā of the perfection of diligence is another.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of perseverance is one thing,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu @458a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / shes rab kyi pha rol tu @458a *//
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of concentration is another,

original: phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of wisdom is another,🔽the dharmatā of inner emptiness is one thing,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of outer emptiness is another,🔽the dharmatā of inner and outer emptiness is another,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the emptiness of emptiness is another,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of great emptiness is another,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of ultimate emptiness is another,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of conditioned emptiness is another, the dharmatā of unconditioned emptiness is another,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the emptiness that is beyond extremes is another,🔽and

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of emptiness that which has no beginning or end is one thing,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of emptiness that which is not to be discarded is another,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the emptiness of inherent existence is another,🔽the dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena is another,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the emptiness of defining characteristics is another,🔽the dharmatā of the emptiness of nonobservation is another,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the emptiness of nonthings is another,🔽the dharmatā of the emptiness of essence is another,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the dharmatā of the emptiness of the essence of nonthings is another.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: The dharmatā of the applications of mindfulness is one thing,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the thorough relinquishments is another,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the bases of miraculous powers is another,

original: dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the faculties is one thing,

original: stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the powers is another,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the branches of awakening is another,

original: 'phags @458b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'phags @458b pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the noble eightfold path is another,🔽the reality of the truths is another,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the concentrations is another,🔽the reality of the immeasurables is another,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the formless absorptions is another,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the deliverances is another,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the serial absorptions is another,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation is another,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the reality of the clairvoyances is another,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the meditative stabilities is one thing,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the dhāraṇī gateways is another,

original: de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the powers of the tathāgatas is one thing,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the fearlessnesses is another,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the detailed and thorough knowledges is another,🔽the nature of great love is another,

original: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of great compassion is another,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the distinct attributes of a buddha is another,

original: mi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the marks of a great person is another,

original: dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the excellent signs is another,

original: 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the nature of the compounded element is another,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the nature of the uncompounded element is another.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags /🔽chos rnam par dgod par ni /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags / chos rnam par dgod par ni /
translated: How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?

original: ji ltar 'gyur /🔽@459a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gyur / @459a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags /
translated: How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?
