analyzed: chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na /
translated: How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags /
translated: How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?🔽How will it be possible to set out the Dharma?

original: ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags /🔽ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /
analyzed: ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags / ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /
translated: How do they enter without fault and transcend the levels of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and how do they perfect the superknowledges?🔽How do they, through the superknowledges, bring love to perfection and perfect the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral conduct, the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par brtse bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par brtse bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags /
translated: the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom, and how do they, through love for them, travel from buddha realm to buddha realm?

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags /
translated: they serve the lord buddhas;

original: de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags /
analyzed: de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags /
translated: they plant wholesome roots in those buddhafields;

original: @459b dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: @459b dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: they bring beings to maturity with those wholesome roots;

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: and they take up the buddhafields.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, it is just as you say.

original: rab 'byor / gang 'di skad du; de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang 'di skad du; de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: That which is the sameness of all dharmas is the sameness of ordinary people,

original: de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: it is the sameness of those who follow faith,

original: de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: it is the sameness of those who follow the Dharma,

original: de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: it is the sameness of the eighth,

original: de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: it is the sameness of the stream enterers,

original: de nyid lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /🔽de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid / de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: That itself is the sameness of phenomena of those who are once-returners.🔽That itself is the sameness of phenomena of those who are non-returners.

original: de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: That itself is the sameness of phenomena of arhats.

original: de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: That itself is the sameness of phenomena of pratyekabuddhas.

original: de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
analyzed: de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid /
translated: That itself is the sameness of phenomena of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na /
translated: That itself is the sameness of phenomena of tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
translated: How can the sameness of phenomena with different characteristics become the sameness of characteristics?”

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /🔽gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems / gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?🔽Is the true dharmic nature of form not emptiness?

original: tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the true dharmic nature of feeling not emptiness?

original: 'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽'du byed kyi chos nyid @460a *//
analyzed: 'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / 'du byed kyi chos nyid @460a *//
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of perception itself emptiness?

original: gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of compositional activity itself emptiness?

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽mig gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / mig gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of consciousness itself emptiness?🔽Is not the intrinsic nature of the eyes itself emptiness?

original: rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the ears itself emptiness?🔽Is not the intrinsic nature of the nose itself emptiness?

original: lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the tongue itself emptiness?

original: lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the body itself emptiness?

original: yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the mind itself emptiness?

original: gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of sights itself emptiness?

original: sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the dharmatā of sound emptiness?🔽Is not the dharmatā of smell emptiness?

original: ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the dharmatā of taste emptiness?🔽Is not the dharmatā of touch emptiness?

original: chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the dharmatā of phenomena emptiness?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the dharmatā of eye consciousness emptiness?🔽Is not the dharmatā of ear consciousness emptiness?🔽Is not the dharmatā of nose consciousness emptiness?

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the dharmatā of tongue consciousness emptiness?

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: of the body consciousness itself emptiness?

original: @460b yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: @460b yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality-dharma of the mental consciousness itself emptiness?

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality-dharma of eye contact itself emptiness?🔽Is not the reality-dharma of ear contact itself emptiness?🔽Is not the reality-dharma of nose contact itself emptiness?

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality-dharma of tongue contact itself emptiness?

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality-dharma of body contact itself emptiness?

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality-dharma of mental contact itself emptiness?

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the real nature of the sensory element of the eyes not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of sights not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of eye consciousness not emptiness?

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the real nature of the sensory element of the ears not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of sounds not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of ear consciousness not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of the nose not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of smells not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of nose consciousness not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of the tongue not emptiness?

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the real nature of the sensory element of tastes not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of tongue consciousness not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of the body not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of tangibles not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of body consciousness not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of the mental faculty not emptiness?🔽Is the real nature of the sensory element of mental phenomena not emptiness?

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the real nature of the sensory element of mind consciousness not emptiness?

original: sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the real nature of the earth element not emptiness?

original: chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the water element emptiness?

original: me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid @461a *//🔽gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid @461a *// gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the fire element emptiness?🔽Is not the intrinsic nature of the wind element emptiness?

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the space element emptiness?🔽Is not the intrinsic nature of the consciousness element emptiness?

original: ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of ignorance emptiness?

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of compositional activity emptiness?

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of consciousness emptiness?

original: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of name and form emptiness?

original: skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: of the six sense bases itself emptiness?

original: reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of contact itself emptiness?

original: tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of feeling itself emptiness?🔽Is not the reality of craving itself emptiness?

original: len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of grasping itself emptiness?🔽Is not the reality of becoming itself emptiness?

original: skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of birth itself emptiness?

original: rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of old age and death itself emptiness?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the perfection of generosity itself emptiness?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the perfection of morality itself emptiness?🔽Is not the reality of the perfection of patience itself emptiness?

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @461b phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @461b phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the perfection of effort itself emptiness?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the perfection of meditation itself emptiness?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin bde nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin bde nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the perfection of wisdom itself emptiness?🔽Is not the reality of inner emptiness itself emptiness?

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of outer emptiness itself emptiness?

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the reality of the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal not itself emptiness?

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the reality of the emptiness of emptiness not itself emptiness?

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the reality of the emptiness of the great not itself emptiness?

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the reality of the emptiness of the ultimate not itself emptiness?

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the reality of the emptiness of the conditioned not itself emptiness?🔽Is the reality of the emptiness of the unconditioned not itself emptiness?

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the reality of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes not itself emptiness?

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic reality of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless itself emptiness?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic reality of the emptiness of non-rejection itself emptiness?

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic reality of the emptiness of nature itself emptiness?

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic reality of the emptiness of all phenomena itself emptiness?🔽Is the intrinsic reality of the emptiness of defining attributes itself emptiness?

original: @462a *// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: @462a *// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic reality of the emptiness of non-observation itself emptiness?

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the emptiness of non-things not itself emptiness?🔽Is the intrinsic nature of the emptiness of intrinsic nature not itself emptiness?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the non-existence of things not itself emptiness?

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the applications of mindfulness not itself emptiness?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the right efforts not itself emptiness?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the legs of miraculous power not itself emptiness?🔽Is the intrinsic nature of the faculties not itself emptiness?

original: stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the powers not itself emptiness?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the branches of enlightenment itself emptiness?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the noble eightfold path itself emptiness?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the noble truths itself emptiness?

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the concentrations itself emptiness?🔽Is not the reality of the immeasurables itself emptiness?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the formless absorptions itself emptiness?

original: rnam par @462b thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par @462b thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the liberations itself emptiness?

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the meditative stabilities of progressive abiding not emptiness?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation not emptiness?

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam; ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam; ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the higher knowledges not emptiness? Is the intrinsic nature of the meditative stabilities not emptiness?

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the dhāraṇī gateways not emptiness?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the powers of the tathāgatas not emptiness?

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the fearlessnesses not emptiness?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the analytical knowledges also emptiness?

original: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of great compassion also emptiness?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha also emptiness?

original: rgyun du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the fruit of stream enterer also emptiness?🔽Is not the intrinsic nature of the fruit of once-returner also emptiness?

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the fruit of non-returner also emptiness?

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang @463a *//
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang @463a *//
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of the state of a worthy one also emptiness?

original: yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the intrinsic nature of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening also emptiness?

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the real nature of the knowledge of path aspects itself emptiness?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the real nature of the knowledge of all aspects itself emptiness?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the real nature of the stream enterers themselves emptiness?

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the real nature of the once-returners themselves emptiness?🔽Is not the real nature of the nonreturners themselves emptiness?

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the real nature of the arhats themselves emptiness?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the real nature of the pratyekabuddhas themselves emptiness?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the real nature of the bodhisattvas themselves emptiness?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the suchness of the Tathāgata just emptiness?🔽Śāriputra replied,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ni / stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni / stong pa nyid do //
translated: it is emptiness.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: “Well then, in emptiness, is there the characteristic of form,

original: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of feeling,

original: 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of perception,

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of formation,

original: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: or the characteristic of consciousness?

original: mig gi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mig gi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: Is there the characteristic of the eyes,

original: rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽sna'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam / sna'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of the ears,🔽the characteristic of the nose,

original: lce'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lce'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of the tongue,

original: lus kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lus kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of the body,

original: yid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: yid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: or the characteristic of the mind?

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: Is there the characteristic of a form,

original: sgra'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽dri'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: sgra'i mtshan nyid dam / dri'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of a sound,🔽the characteristic of a smell,

original: ro'i @463b mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: ro'i @463b mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of a taste,

original: reg gi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: reg gi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristic of a tactile object,

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: or the characteristic of a mental object?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: Is there the characteristic of the eye consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the ear consciousness,🔽the defining characteristic of the nose consciousness,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam; lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam; lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the body consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the mind consciousness,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of eye contact,🔽the defining characteristic of ear contact,🔽the defining characteristic of nose contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of tongue contact,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of body contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: and the defining characteristic of mind contact,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact,🔽the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mind,🔽the defining characteristic of the earth element,

original: sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam; chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam; chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the water element,

original: me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam /🔽rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam / rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the fire element,🔽the defining characteristic of the wind element,

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of the space element,🔽the defining characteristic of the consciousness element,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam; ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam; ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of ignorance,

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of name and form,

original: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam /🔽reg pa'i @464a *//
analyzed: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam / reg pa'i @464a *//
translated: the defining characteristic of the six sense sources,

original: mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of contact,

original: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of feeling,

original: sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of craving,

original: len pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: len pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristic of grasping,

original: srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of existence,

original: skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of birth,

original: rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of aging and death,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the perfection of discipline,🔽the characteristics of the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the perfection of diligence,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam / nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the perfection of wisdom,🔽the characteristics of inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of outer and inner emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the defining characteristics of the emptiness of what transcends limits,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of the beginning and end,🔽the defining characteristics of the emptiness of nonrejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of nonobservation,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of nonentities,🔽the defining characteristics of the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo @464b nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo @464b nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /🔽dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam / dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the correct exertions,🔽the defining characteristics of the bases of supernatural powers,🔽the defining characteristics of the faculties,

original: stobs rnams kyi mchan nyid dam /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi mchan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the noble eightfold path,🔽the defining characteristics of the truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the successive stages of meditative absorption,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the superknowledges,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /🔽byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam / byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the characteristics of great love,

original: snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan @465a *//🔽nyid dam / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan @465a *// nyid dam / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the result of non-returner,🔽the characteristics of the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of a stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of a once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽dgra bcom pa'i 'das nyid dam /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam / dgra bcom pa'i 'das nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of a non-returner,🔽the defining characteristics of a worthy one,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of a pratyekabuddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of a bodhisattva,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: or the defining characteristics of a tathāgata,🔽or the defining characteristics of a dharma, be apprehended?

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam; gsol pa /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam; gsol pa /
translated: He replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ni / ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni / ma lags so //
translated: it cannot.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
translated: “Subhūti, therefore,

original: rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste /🔽chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med /
analyzed: rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste / chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med /
translated: by this one of many explanations it should be known that🔽in the true nature of dharmas there are no ordinary beings,

original: so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med /
translated: and apart from ordinary beings there is no true nature of dharmas,

original: de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med /
analyzed: de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med /
translated: and in the true nature of dharmas there are no followers of faith,

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med /
translated: Apart from the one who follows faith, there is no suchness.🔽Apart from suchness, there is no one who follows faith.🔽Apart from the one who follows reality, there is no suchness.

original: de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med /🔽chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang brgyad pa med /
analyzed: de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang brgyad pa med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no one who follows reality.🔽Apart from the eighth-lowest stage, there is no suchness.

original: brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa med /
analyzed: brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no eighth-lowest stage.🔽Apart from stream entry, there is no suchness.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no stream entry.🔽Apart from the once-returner, there is no suchness.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang phyir mi 'ong ba med /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang phyir mi 'ong ba med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no once-returner.🔽Apart from the nonreturner, there is no suchness.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba las gud @465b na'ang de med /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba las gud @465b na'ang de med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no nonreturner.🔽Apart from the arhat, there is no suchness.

original: de la'ang dgra bcom pa med /🔽dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang rang sangs rgyas med /
analyzed: de la'ang dgra bcom pa med / dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang rang sangs rgyas med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no arhat.🔽Apart from the pratyekabuddha, there is no suchness.

original: rang sangs rgyas las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' med /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no pratyekabuddha.🔽Apart from the bodhisattva, there is no suchness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' las gud na'ang de med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las gud na'ang de med /
translated: Apart from suchness, there is no bodhisattva.

original: de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa med /
analyzed: de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa med /
translated: Apart from the tathāgata, there is no suchness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang de med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang de med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that it is not separate from the Tathāgata.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: 'dus ma bgyis pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma bgyis pa lags /
translated: is that reality compounded or uncompounded?”🔽“Blessed One, is it compounded or uncompounded?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: de ni / 'dus byas kyang ma yin /
analyzed: de ni / 'dus byas kyang ma yin /
translated: “It is not compounded

original: 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te /🔽'dus byas las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te / 'dus byas las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med do //
translated: and it is not uncompounded.🔽The uncompounded cannot be observed apart from the compounded,

original: 'dus ma byas las gud na'ang 'dus byas dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas las gud na'ang 'dus byas dmigs su med do //
translated: and the compounded cannot be observed apart from the uncompounded.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, those two phenomena—the compounded element and the uncompounded element—are neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: gzugs med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa /
translated: They are formless,

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: cannot be shown,

original: thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa /
translated: have no obstruction,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: and are of a single mark—

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: that is, they are without a mark.

original: de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi /
analyzed: de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi /
translated: The Tathāgata has described them as such in order to communicate with the world.

original: don dam par ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par ma yin te /
translated: not ultimately.

original: don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam /
analyzed: don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam /
translated: In the ultimate, there is no bodily activity,

original: ngag gi 'du byed dam /
analyzed: ngag gi 'du byed dam /
translated: no verbal activity,

original: yid kyi 'du byed med de /
analyzed: yid kyi 'du byed med de /
translated: and no mental activity.

original: lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na'ang don dam pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na'ang don dam pa dmigs su med do //
translated: Apart from bodily activity, verbal activity, and mental activity, the ultimate is not perceived.

original: 'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin @466a *//🔽pa de ni /🔽don dam pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin @466a *// pa de ni / don dam pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the ultimate is the sameness of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa las kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa las kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: Therefore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not move from the ultimate,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang byed do //
translated: and they also engage in bodhisattva activity.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: This was the seventy-first chapter, “The Perfection of Wisdom,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines.”

original: le'u bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
translated: Chapter Seventy-Two

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One!

original: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni /
translated: The sameness of all dharmas

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
translated: is empty of a basic nature.

original: de'i slad du chos gang la'ang gang yang ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis na /
analyzed: de'i slad du chos gang la'ang gang yang ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis na /
translated: Therefore, there is nothing whatsoever that is done by any dharma at all.

original: de ltar chos thams cad ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis shing /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis shing /
translated: Thus, since all dharmas are nothing whatsoever,

original: ci'ang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa las kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: ci'ang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe don dam pa las kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: and are not anything at all, how do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyi ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyi ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags /
translated: not move from the ultimate and also work for the welfare of all sentient beings through generosity, kind words, actions that benefit others, and practicing what you preach?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!🔽It is just as you have said.

original: ji skad du smras pa bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /🔽gang la'ang ci la'ang byed pa'ang med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni / gang la'ang ci la'ang byed pa'ang med /
translated: That emptiness🔽does not do anything at all to anything at all.

original: ci'ang mi byed pa'ang med de /
analyzed: ci'ang mi byed pa'ang med de /
translated: It does not do anything at all.

original: gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni /
analyzed: gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni /
translated: If these sentient beings were to know emptiness themselves,

original: de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: then they would not waver from emptiness,

original: sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes @466b dang bral bar byed cing /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes @466b dang bral bar byed cing /
translated: and they would be freed from the notion of self.🔽Freed from the notion of self, they would be liberated from cyclic existence by means of emptiness.

original: bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
analyzed: bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
translated: They would be freed from the notion of sentient beings.🔽Freed from the notion of sentient beings, they would be liberated from cyclic existence by means of emptiness.

original: sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

original: srog gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
analyzed: srog gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

original: 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

translated: Having separated them from the notion of a living being, they are liberated from cyclic existence through emptiness.🔽Having separated them from the notion of a creature, they are liberated from cyclic existence through emptiness.🔽Having separated them from the notion of a master, they are liberated from cyclic existence through emptiness.

analyzed: shed bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
